item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Installing Smart Connections Obsidian Plugin Open Obsidian. Navigate to Settings > Community Plugins. Click on Browse and search for Smart Connections.

item.title: FAQs
item.description: Is my data secure when using Smart Connect? Yes, Smart Connect operates locally, and your data is never saved on servers when using the Smart Connect Official Service ...

item.title: FAQs
item.description: Can I use Smart Connections without Smart Connect? Yes, Smart Connections can be used independently within Obsidian. Smart Connect adds additional functionality by integrating with ChatGPT.

item.title: Introducing Smart Context for VS Code
item.description: Securely Enhance Your AI Coding Workflow in VS Code In today’s rapidly evolving development world, integrating AI tools like ChatGPT into your workflow is becoming more common ...

item.title: Individual aligned AI will be our only hope against capable bad actors
item.description: key points Prevents reliance on a single centralized source Maintains focus on the individual’s desires Reduces complexity of the necessary solution .

item.title: PKM Demo vault
item.description: Explore an Obsidian vault about PKM. Smart Connections plugin is already installed and embeddings are included. On GitHub Download link.

item.title: Smart Sources settings
item.description: Embedding Model Description: The Embedding Model determines how your notes are converted into vector representations for AI processing. Selecting a Model: Choose from available models (e.g., "TaylorAI/bge-micro-v2").

item.title: Manual Re-Embedding for Specific Notes
item.description: To re-embed a single note within Obsidian, use the “Refresh & make connections” command.

item.title: Inspect blocks created for a note
